experience.title: 6th Annual National High School Club Software Competition
experience.experi:
In 2021, I took on the challenge of an on-campus program exhibition to test my abilities. I created Math Rain! in Python PyQt5 with the motif of acid rain from the old Hancomta Nature Learning program and received many praises.

However, I wanted to make a mobile app to solve the inconvenience of my daily life, not a computer program, and I wanted to make it public. At that time, my teacher gave me a flyer for the national high school club program presentation, and I developed a Nofy using subway station WiFi BSSID as a project leader, and I presented it to my high school club friends across the country and received a lot of praise. 2021 was an important year for me to develop my capabilities and collaboration in team projects.

experience.title: Program maintenance and a heart for teaching juniors
experience.experi:
When 2022 came around, I was very excited to see how many juniors would join our club. In fact, more juniors came to our club than I expected, and my teacher asked me if I would teach my knowledge to the juniors every Friday. I worked hard because I wanted to gain experience in teaching someone and because I think teaching someone is the best way to remember and learn, and it paid off.

However, I didn't neglect my own development. I upgraded the Nofy I developed last year, improved the UI and performance, and presented it at the Korean Code Fair.

portfolio.name: Nofy
portfolio.desc: An app that recognises your WiFi BSSID and lets you know you've arrived without using the subway's timeline.

portfolio.name: Lena
portfolio.desc: This chatbot has been used by over 2000 people in an app called Discord.

portfolio.name: Auto Self-Dia
portfolio.desc: An automated self-checker designed to eliminate the frustration of doing the same self-check every morning.

portfolio.name: PingPongWR
portfolio.desc: A Python module that makes it easy to use PingPongBuilder's API.

portfolio.name: Teshin Bot
portfolio.desc: We implemented the Teshin shop item rotation for a game called Warframe as a Discord bot using the API.

portfolio.name: LOL_PW
portfolio.desc: A prog that uses Riot's LCU API to automatically populate lines in League of Legends.

portfolio.name: Azite Bot
portfolio.desc: This is an automation bot developed for the convenience of the Discord Azite Valorant server.

portfolio.name: Sneaky
portfolio.desc: This is a person catching game made in Html, Css, and JavaScript.
